prev.title: today we are going to share a new paper about druid
prev.summary: Hi all, today we are going to share a new paper about druid. http://static.druid.io/docs/druid.pdf It's related to the previous share about scuba. They are all column-oriented database storage. Like scuba, The Druid database also has an in-memory data storage strategy.

next.summary: The hard disks that fail abruptly at 32,768 hours of use – why simply ‘adding 1’ can send you into oblivion.
